name: pnp-devproxy-llm-usage-csv-export
title: Export LLM usage metrics to CSV
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use Dev Proxy to export LLM usage metrics to a CSV file for detailed analysis. The OpenAIUsageDebuggingPlugin captures usage data from OpenAI-compatible API requests and writes them to a CSV file, enabling offline analysis in spreadsheets or BI tools.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use Dev Proxy to export LLM usage metrics to a CSV file for detailed analysis. The OpenAIUsageDebuggingPlugin captures usage data from OpenAI-compatible API requests and writes them to a CSV file, enabling offline analysis in spreadsheets or BI tools.
